    int leds[] = {2, 3, 4, 5};

void setup() {
  for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
    pinMode(leds[i], OUTPUT);
  }
}

void loop() {
  for (int num = 0; num < 16; num++) {
    for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
      int bit = (num >> i) & 1;
      digitalWrite(leds[i], bit);
    }
    delay(1000);
  }
}
